name: thoughtfully
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you are thinking a lot about something: He gazed thoughtfully into the distance.
in a way that is kind and shows you are thinking about other people's needs: There were sandwiches, thoughtfully provided by his wife.
in a way that has been planned well and thought about carefully: The art is thoughtfully arranged. See
thoughtful
More examplesFewer examplesThoughtfully directed by George Ballis, this production is brilliantly performed by a 19-member cast.George stared thoughtfully at the floor. When asked how he'll make sure that doesn't happen, he pauses thoughtfully and replies, "I have people to do that for me."Dennis thoughtfully offered to drop me off in town.Take the time to lay out the beds thoughtfully so the right amount of water reaches your garden plants and you do not encourage weeds.While change is difficult, a thoughtfully planned process can turn problems into opportunities.
